class core.context.Context(binary, verbose=False)[source]¶

Context class

The Context class to be transfered to user’s function as pt to provide utilities and data

dis(addr, size=64)[source]¶

disassembles content

disassembles some content at some address of given size

Parameters:
  • addr (int) – address to disassemble
  • size (int) – how many bytes to disassemble, default to 64
Returns:

disassembled content
Return type:

str
disiter(addr)[source]¶

disassembles content returns iterator

disassembles content but returns iterator so we can move on till the end

Parameters:addr (int) – the address to start disassemble
Returns:the iterator containing the disassembled content
Return type:Iterator
irdis(addr, size=64)[source]¶

  • size (int) – how many bytes to disassemble, default to 64
